ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
Not (Or(Proposed_Account_Manager__r.Profile.Name = 'Coverage Sales', Proposed_Account_Manager__r.Profile.Name = 'BG Base', Proposed_Account_Manager__r.Profile.Name ='Sales 3rd Party',
Proposed_Account_Manager__r.Profile.Name ='Hub Users'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Proposed Account Manager must be a Coverage Sales, Hub User or Sales 3rd Party user in system
